desc: Get personalized guidance from consultants of top B schools like Harvard, Kellogg, LBS, IIMA, IIMB, ISB etc, for MiM, MBA applications... unlimited edits & doubt clearance. We guide you with admissions strategy, college selection, essay development, LOR guidance, interview prep, hourly consulting at affordable prices.

layout.text: Expert consulting for your MBA and MiM applications

At iMetiss, our team of best-in-class MBA and MiM consultants, who are top B school alumni and experts with diverse industry experience, handhold applicants through the entire application process and mentor them for interviews in a personalized one-on-one manner. We treat your application as our own and work with you to identify your unique strength, tell your stories effectively and guide you to position yourself as a strong candidate basis institutes’ expectations.
